00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_WII_REMOTE_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_WII_REMOTE_H_
00031 
00032 #include "lubyk.h"
00033 using namespace lubyk;
00034 
00035 namespace wii {
00036 
00037 class Browser;
00038 
00046 class Remote : public LuaObject {
00047   std::string name_;
00048 
00049   class Implementation;
00050   Implementation *impl_;
00051   friend class Implementation;
00052 public:
00053   Remote(const char *remote_name = NULL);
00054 
00055   ~Remote();
00056 
00057   const char *name() const {
00058     return name_.c_str();
00059   }
00060 
00061   void disconnect();
00062 
00065   void setLeds(bool led1, bool led2, bool led3, bool led4);
00066 
00067   //*********** CALLBACKS
00068 
00071   void acceleration(const char *sensor, float x, float y, float z) {
00072     lua_State *L = lua_;
00073 
00074     if (!pushLuaCallback("acceleration")) return;
00075     lua_pushstring(L, sensor);
00076     lua_pushnumber(L, x);
00077     lua_pushnumber(L, y);
00078     lua_pushnumber(L, z);
00079     // <func> <self> <sensor name> <x> <y> <z>
00080     int status = lua_pcall(L, 5, 0, 0);
00081 
00082     if (status) {
00083       printf("Error in 'acceleration' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00084     }
00085   }
00086 
00089   void button(const char *type, bool pressed) {
00090     lua_State *L = lua_;
00091 
00092     if (!pushLuaCallback("button")) return;
00093     lua_pushstring(L, type);
00094     lua_pushboolean(L, pressed);
00095     // <func> <self> <btn name> <pressed>
00096     int status = lua_pcall(L, 3, 0, 0);
00097 
00098     if (status) {
00099       printf("Error in 'button' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00100     }
00101   }
00102 
00105   void disconnected() {
00106     lua_State *L = lua_;
00107 
00108     if (!pushLuaCallback("disconnected")) return;
00109     // <func> <self>
00110     int status = lua_pcall(L, 1, 0, 0);
00111 
00112     if (status) {
00113       printf("Error in 'disconnected' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00114     }
00115   }
00116 
00119   void connected() {
00120     lua_State *L = lua_;
00121 
00122     if (!pushLuaCallback("connected")) {
00123       // default action
00124       setLeds(true, false, false, false);
00125       return;
00126     }
00127 
00128     lua_pushstring(L, name_.c_str());
00129     // <func> <self> <name>
00130     int status = lua_pcall(L, 2, 0, 0);
00131 
00132     if (status) {
00133       printf("Error in 'connected' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00134     }
00135   }
00136 
00139   void setRemote(void *remote);
00140 };
00141 } // wii
